physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a general store. There are two males standing in the store
 one being the shopkeeper and another presumably a customer. There is an assortment of food items around the store. Examples are bananas
 ginger
 tomatoes
 etc. Numerous large jars containing food items can be seen at the lower left hand side of the photograph as well. A lady can be seen squatting at the right hand side of the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Chinese General Store Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a general store. There are two males standing in the store, one being the shopkeeper and another presumably a customer. There is an assortment of food items around the store. Examples are bananas, ginger, tomatoes, etc. Numerous large jars containing food items can be seen at the lower left hand side of the photograph as well. A lady can be seen squatting at the right hand side of the photograph.
